1. Providing excellent customer service: Mitsubishi can invest in providing high-quality customer service to keep customers satisfied and loyal.

2. Offering value-added products: Mitsubishi can offer value-added products such as warranties, financing options, and aftersales services.

3. Engaging with customers: Mitsubishi can engage with customers through social media campaigns, email marketing, and other marketing techniques to build relationships and remain top-of-mind.

4. Maintaining price points: Mitsubishi can maintain consistent price points to avoid confusing customers during times of economic instability.

5. Focusing on customer experience: Mitsubishi can focus on delivering an exceptional customer experience, providing a personalized approach to serve customers’ needs.

6. Supporting customers in tough times: Mitsubishi can provide support to customers in tough economic times by offering additional financing options, deferring payments or providing different pricing plans so that customers remain a priority and not suffer in tough situations.

In conclusion, Mitsubishi can use a combination of these strategies to maintain customer loyalty during periods of economic instability.
